title: 关于我 About Me
content:
嘿！你好，我的朋友，这是白桦用来分享的博客。网站的内容除特别声明外，均为原创。本网站所收集的全部信息不会被公开，也不会被用作商业用途。

本站所有使用 CC 协议的摄影作品只要注明出处即可随意使用，非 CC 协议的作品如果您有需要也可以在评论区留言，我也很愿意提供帮助。此外，我的部分作品可以在 CC0 社区 Pixabay 上找到，无需注明出处即可用于商业用途。

本站由 Hexo + inside 驱动，评论系统由 Valine + LeanCloud 支援。感谢所有参与贡献的开发者。

希望你能够在这收获一份快乐。
再次感谢❤。

Hi! My friend! This is the tiny blog where I share things.
All the posts are original except the ones under sepcial license. Information that collected by this site shall not be shared or put into commercial use.

All the photography work under CC license could be use with author. If you need to use a work without CC license, please leave a message in the comment. I will be glad to offer my work. Except for that, part of my work could be found in CC0 community Pixabay. Fell free to use them without credi.

This site is powered by Hexo + inside, the comment system is supported by Valine and LeanCloud. Thanks for all the developer that contributed.

Enjoy yourself.
Thanks again❤.
